content: I usually plan my meals around what's on sale at the grocery store and what ingredients I already have at home. I'm not too picky about brands, as long as the quality is good. I do have a favorite pasta recipe, though - it's a simple spaghetti Bolognese that I make with ground beef and tomatoes. I'm always looking for ways to make it more cost-effective, so I appreciate the tips! By the way, do you have any suggestions on how to find more coupons and discounts for my favorite brands?
